Protected Slots

virtual void slotRightPressed (QIconViewItem *item)
 The right click on a cluster icon bring a dialog allowing the user to enter information on the cluster (structure, type, isolation distance, quality and notes).
virtual void slotMousePressed (int button, QIconViewItem *item)
virtual void slotClickRedraw ()
virtual void languageChange ()
virtual void slotOnItem (QIconViewItem *item)
 When moving the mouse over an cluster icon, the statusBar is updated with the information the user might could provided (structure, type, isolation distance, quality and notes).

Detailed Description

This class represents the Cluster Panel of the application.

It receives the user selections and triggers the actions which have to be done.

Author:
Lynn Hazan
